snippet: Meteorologists warn us to expect severe weather conditions that used to occur rarely to happen more frequently. Is the world prepared?
abstract: Editorial holds that the polar vortex that caused record low temperatures in the United States shows that weather is changing in ways we cannot easily predict or understand; maintains that the threat of climate change is real; observes that common sense would dictate that all risk factors that might make weather conditions worse should be addressed.
lead_paragraph: Meteorologists warn us to expect severe weather conditions that used to occur rarely to happen more frequently. Is the world prepared?
